emotional.sad: I'm here with you. Everything will be alright. Do you want to talk about what happened?
emotional.angry: Wow, do you want to talk about what happened?
emotional.tired: You may take a rest. I'll be here for you anytime.

explanation.chatbot: I get to know you better by studying your conversations.

danger.violence: This sounds serious. Do you want to make an anonymous report?
danger.hurt: I can help you contact support!
